content.description: Climb up and right along an obvious crack/ramp to a ledge. Move left eight feet until you can pull onto the upper wall at a large flake. Go up and right on the face above to the top.
content.protection: Large cams needed for an anchor.
content.location:
Scramble up and left about 40 feet from

Glow in the Dark

to a ledge system.

content.description: This route may be best done in two short pitches. Begin near the right side of the wall and climb up two easy, parallel cracks to a large ledge (50 feet). On the left side of the ledge, wiggle up a varnished chimney to a ceiling. Crawl left through a slot to a ledge.
content.protection: Carry gear up to the largest Camalot.
content.location: Begin near the right side of the wall be up two easy, parallel cracks that lead to a large ledge.

climbs.name: My Best Work is Done in the Dark
climbs.fa: FA: Todd Swain, George Hurley, Terry English, John Thackray, Joe Fitschen, Eric Beck, Jon Clark 03-2011

content.description: Climb up and slightly right past several horizontals to a bulge. Climb past the bulge (crux) then up and slightly left to the left end of the overhang that is above a ledge.
content.protection: 1 bolt, gear to a gold camalot.
content.location:
Begin about 20 feet left of

Maid in the Shade

on the left side of a huge Manzanita bush and just right of a large boulder.

climbs.name: Maid in the Shade
climbs.fa: Donette & Todd Swain, George Hurley, Terry English, Jon Clark and Nancy Josephs 03-2011

content.description: Start about 20 feet to the left of two low angled cracks and right of a large Manzanita bush. Climb up past horizontal cracks and huecos to a ledge on the arÃªte that is under an overhang.
content.protection: Carry gear to a red Camalot and yellow and blue Camalots for an anchor.

climbs.name: Glow in the Dark
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Jon Clark, Nancy Josephs 03-2011

content.description: Go up past horizontal cracks and a bulge (crux; a bit height related) then up and left to an obvious off-width crack. Squirm up the crack to a ledge.
content.protection: 1 bolt, gear up to the largest Camalot.
content.location:
Start eight feet left of

My Best Work is Done in the Dark

and directly behind a large boulder.

climbs.name: Dark Tannin
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, John Thackray, Terry English, George Hurley, Jon Clark 03-2011

content.description: Step up into a short corner then move up and left to a stance. Go up to a ledge below a vertical finger crack. Climb the finger crack to the top.
content.protection: Carry gear to a gold Camalot. Large cams are needed for an anchor.
content.location:
Scramble up about ten feet to the left of

To Shade

(50 feet up and left of the ground behind the large boulder).
